mapper.select: select distinct APV_APPROVAL.DEPT_ID as DEPT_ID, APV_APPROVAL.SUBSIDY_CODE as SUBSIDY_CODE, APV_APPROVAL_BATCH_DETAIL.BATCH_ID as BATCH_ID, FILE_PATH_ATBLE.LOCAL_PATH as LOCAL_PATH, APV_APPROVAL.TOTAL_COUNT as TOTAL_COUNT, APV_APPROVAL.TOTAL_MONEY as TOTAL_MONEY, S_SUBSIDY.DIGEST_CODE as DIGEST_CODE, S_SUBSIDY.DIGEST_DESC as DIGEST_DESC from APV_APPROVAL_BATCH_DETAIL, APV_APPROVAL, APV_APPROVAL_BATCH, FILE_PATH_ATBLE, S_SUBSIDY where APV_APPROVAL.ID = APV_APPROVAL_BATCH_DETAIL.APPROVAL_ID and APV_APPROVAL_BATCH.APPROVAL_ID = APV_APPROVAL.ID and FILE_PATH_ATBLE.BACTH_ID = APV_APPROVAL_BATCH_DETAIL.BATCH_ID and S_SUBSIDY.CODE = APV_APPROVAL.SUBSIDY_CODE and APV_APPROVAL_BATCH.BANK_NOTICE_TYPE = '0'
